task.title: Create Scheduling Jobs
task.shortdesc: The job scheduler enables administrators to build a job to create daily scheduling notifications for employees. Jobs can run on scheduled days and times or on demand.

taskbody.context: The job scheduler listens for messages coming from Time Off and Allowances about relevant updates to data.

step.cmd: Select Yes to enable the schedule.
If applicable, select the days and parameters. For example, a daily notification job can have a schedule type of "Exact" where the applicable days are selected.
